attributes.action: Make a law to devolve particular powers after the UK leaves the EU
attributes.additional_details: This should also be taken also be brought to the Supreme Court, so that they can decide whether it should be made illegal or not.
attributes.background: It’s been confirmed that the UK government will try to take back control of our devolved powers, such as fisheries, farming and agriculture. So, I call for this power grab to be made illegal.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You'll need to give your full name to start a petition.
